channel.title: Thoughts in a pond
channel.description: Recent content on Thoughts in a pond

item.title: Eliana Grande
item.description:
crazy goof ball with strong legs

facts

  • has nutella lighter
  • shows me food she made this week
  • shows me food she made years ago
  • shows me hot picures of her this week and years ago
  • shows me porn her brother watched before going to his girlfriend
  • tells me she is a genius
  • asks me to tell her something to make her cry
  • wants someone to buy her clothes
  • cute cat

item.title: The Foundation
item.description: “I work for an independent scientific research institution with a specialist focus on the containment of hazardous anomalous phenomena. We have an international mandate and formidable resources and… unimaginable responsibilities. We… we watch the blizzard. And we guard the little fire. We’re called the Foundation.” - There Is No Antimemetics Division
